title: Cod fillet with crispy bacon & pea purée

ingredients.item: 3 rashers Essential Smoked Streaky Bacon, halved
2 tbsp finely chopped fresh mint, plus extra to serve
2 tbsp Essential Reduced Fat British Crème Fraîche

instructions.step: Heat a small frying pan, add the bacon and dry fry for 4-5 minutes until crisp. Transfer to a plate. Put the cod in the pan, scatter the shallots on top and spoon over 3 tbsp of the milk. Cover and cook gently for 5 minutes or until the fish is opaque and cooked through.

Put the peas, mint and remaining milk in a separate saucepan; season and cook for 4-5 minutes until the peas are tender. Add the crème fraîche and blend to a smooth purée. Spoon onto serving plates, top with the cod and bacon, and serve scattered with the extra mint sprigs.
